chapter.title: 2003-01-01 Post-Dated The Italians have already ordered the donut
chapter.para:
The date of this dream, is non-verifiable, data loss error (Revelation 22:18-19).
The only serving at a restaurant are two chicken wings.
When I asked the waiteress for the corn bread?
The waiteress says, the Italians have already ordered the donut.
Italians is a plural term, donut is singular.
I asked for corn bread, the response was there was no donut.
I do not know the difference between making a corn bread or donut.
Both corn bread and donut are flour based.
A donut is circular, probably replica of the forth-coming biblical fifth kingdom.
A corn bread is orange, donuts? Depending on its glazing.
